channel.title: MidwestWeekends - Travel in Minnesota, Wisconsin, Illinois, Iowa
channel.description: Up-to-date information on travel in the Upper Midwest

item.title: 15 great places for kids in Minnesota
item.description: There's a world of adventure awaiting families in the Land of Lakes.

item.title: 15 great places for kids in Wisconsin
item.description: From farm to city to beach, the state is one big playground for children.

item.title: Chicago by bicycle
item.description: On a bike, visitors can explore every inch of Chicago's gorgeous lakefront.

item.title: Bicycling in Wisconsin
item.description: The state that pioneered rail trails isn't resting on its laurels.

item.title: Walking in Duluth
item.description: Trails along creeks, ravines and bays provide stellar hiking in the heart of town.

item.title: 15 great rivers for paddling
item.description: On a fine day, go sightseeing in a canoe or kayak.

item.title: Cheat the heat
item.description: When summer in the Upper Midwest becomes a sauna, it's time to chill out.
